subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A goal 12 seconds into overtime on Thursday night helped the Blackhawks win their first playoff game in seven years, as they defeated the Calgary Flames, 3-2.
snippet: A goal 12 seconds into overtime on Thursday night helped the Blackhawks win their first playoff game in seven years, as they defeated the Calgary Flames, 3-2.
